comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content:
This is Charles' 1859 Minsirty - from left to right: John F. Hargrave (solicitor general), John Robertson (secretary for land and public works), Charles Cowper (premier), Elias Carpenter Weekes (colonial treasurer) and Lyttleton Holyoake Bayley (attorney general).

You can read more about Charles Cowper here:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/johncowper/2095113296/in/set-72157603411804549]
